Texts.Chs:
用于在容器之间传输物品。
^blue;输入节点^white;1^blue;：^white;电源开关
^blue;输入节点^white;2^blue;：^white;物品网络
^red;输出节点^blue;：^white;物品网络^reset;
Texts.Eng:
Moves items between containers.
^blue;Input^white;1^blue;: ^white;power switch
^blue;Input^white;2^blue;: ^white;item network
^red;Output: ^white;item network^reset;
